h1_title: King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince
h2_title: King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you hear him start to yell at a distance, be prepared for a charge attack that comes with a three hit smashing sweep attack, and wait until his final attack to retaliate with your own combo attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'King_of_Flowing_Sands_and_Second_Rat_Prince.md', within the main section titled 'King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince', specifically from the subsection 'King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you hear him start to yell at a distance, be prepared for a charge attack that comes with a three hit smashing sweep attack, and wait until his final attack to retaliate with your own combo attack.
